full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL RDO RJE SEMS DPA'I SGRUB THABS DANG SBYIN SREG GI CHO GA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014B (ZHES DPAL RDO RJE SEMS DPA'I SGRUB THABS DANG, SBYIN SREG GI CHO GA 'DI NI CHOS RJE AER TE NI PAndI TA MKHAN PO DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSO NAS BSKUL BA LTAR, ^PAndI TA CHEN PO AA BHYA: RAS MDZAD PA'I SBYIN SREG 'OD KYI SNYE MA DANG, KHAMS GSUM CHOS KYI RGYAL PO RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I LEGS BSHAD CHEN PO DNGOS GRUB RGYA MTSO SOGS KYI DGONGS PA DANG MTHUN PA, ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,)
